front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Provider Backbone Bridge Local Area Networks (PBB)
Shortest Path Bridging Protocol (SPB) (SPBV) (SPBM) Intermediate System to Intermediate System (IS-IS).
front.abstract: This amendment specifies shortest path bridging of unicast and multicast frames,including protocols to calculate multiple active topologies that can share learnt station information, and support of a VLAN by multiple, per topology VLAN identifiers (VIDs).
